name: Sheeps! (KhaosPhoenix, MJ)
description:
Help Max the dog herd sheep into pens in this iteration of the classic Snake!

The more sheep you collect the more points you get; placing those sheep in the pens will give bonus points! But watch out, you get faster with every sheep that follows you!

------------------------------------------------------------------

How To Play

Arrow Keys or W, A, S, D to move around

------------------------------------------------------------------
